LanguageData.PLGOPT_DisableWorldDataDescription: Allow disabling World Data: World Data are various data used by PrepareLanding to display information about the world.If set, this removes the information, saves some memory and some CPU cycles. In return less information is available.
LanguageData.PLOPT_AllowLiveFilteringToolTip: [Warning: CPU heavy] Allow filtering without pressing the "Filter" button.
LanguageData.PLOPT_AllowImpassableTilesToolTip: Allow selection and filtering of impassable tiles.
LanguageData.PLOPT_DisablePreFilterCheckToolTip: Disable the check where Biomes and Terrains must be selected with a world coverage >= 50%.
LanguageData.PLOPT_ViewPartialOffNoSelectToolTip: Allow to view the PartialOffNoSelect button on the GUI for grouped three state items.
LanguageData.PLOPT_ResetAllFiltersOnNewWorld: Reset all filters on new world
LanguageData.PLOPT_ResetAllFiltersOnNewWorldToolTip: If ON, all filters are reset to their default state on a new generated world, otherwise the filters are kept in their previous state.
LanguageData.PLOPT_ShowFilterHeavinessToolTip: Show filter heaviness (possible filter CPU calculation heaviness) on filter header in the GUI.
LanguageData.PLOPT_AllowInvalidTilesForNewSettlement: Allow Invalid Tiles for New Settlement
LanguageData.PLOPT_AllowInvalidTilesForNewSettlementT: If ON, this prevents a last pass that would have removed tiles deemed as not valid for a new settlement.
LanguageData.PLOPT_DisableTileBlinkingToolTip: Disable tile blinking ("breathing") for filtered tiles on the world map.
LanguageData.PLOPT_ShowDebugTileIdToolTip: Show the Debug Tile ID for the highlighted tiles.
